title: Customer Engagement Marketing Manager
description:
Want to be part of an amazing team, hell-bent on crafting a better future? We're always looking for creative people who care!



We are analysts. Creators. Designers. Doers. Dreamers. Explorers. Geeks. Hipsters. Leaders. Learners. Renegades. Seekers. Strategists. Visionaries. And we fundamentally believe that we're better together.



We are looking for a remote **Customer Engagement Marketing Manager** to join our enterprise tech client's team. This role will sit on the Tech for Social Impact (TSI) Marketing team and will play a key role in developing and executing marketing and engagement models with strategic federated/affiliate-based nonprofits. The role will focus on building engagement plans to support tech acceleration aligned to the organization's goals while increasing organization penetration and growing TSI revenue through a number of marketing engines. This includes content development, event coordination, sponsorship, customer advocacy, lead generation and tracking ROI while collaborating closely with various teams such as sales, solutions, and partner teams.



As part of the Tech for Social Impact Marketing team, you'll embrace the company's marketing principles, drive marketing efficiency and scale, and be customer centric. You'll be part of an integrated marketing team that supports sales to generate pipeline, accelerate deals, and delight our customers, creating brand love.


**Would you like to…**


* Collaborate with strategic nonprofits to develop customized marketing strategies that align with their digital transformation goals and objectives, while supporting TSI's priorities.
* Build and manage strong relationships with key stakeholders in strategic nonprofits, ensuring effective communication and collaboration.
* Lead the development and execution of an Account-Based Marketing (ABM) plan, tailored to each organization within our strategic nonprofit partnerships.
* Create and implement engaging marketing campaigns, events, and initiatives to generate leads and increase brand awareness within the strategic nonprofits.
* Develop and optimize lead capture mechanisms and processes to ensure efficient lead management and conversion, leveraging existing resources and opportunities.
* Collaborate with Sales team to track and measure the ROI of marketing initiatives, ensuring alignment with revenue goals and highlighting key metrics, insights, and recommendations for improvement.


**We would like you to have…**


* Bachelor's degree in marketing, Business, or a related field.
* Experience with marketing principles, account-based marketing or partnership management, preferably within the nonprofit sector.
* Excellent team player with project management skills, who can prioritize tasks, meet deadlines, and manage multiple projects simultaneously.
* Excellent oral and written communication skills.
* Experience or familiar with event strategy and event execution, including executing in-person event booth and online/virtual events.
* Experience collaborating with sales teams to drive a connected marketing and sales funnel and working with demand generation marketing tools.
* Experience working with Microsoft or other enterprise tech companies is preferred


**Would you like to work for an organization that…**


* Embraces work-life balance – our employees' well-being remains a top priority for us
* Promotes a culture of learning and advocacy across the globe - diversity will enable us to strengthen our impact
* Offers a comprehensive benefits package effective Day 1. Options include health, vision, & dental insurance, FSAs, discounts on pet insurance, PTO, paid holidays, and more
* Encourages innovation and experimentation
* Emphasizes and rewards collaboration
* Works remotely. We continue to safeguard the health of our employees so our interviewing and on-boarding process will remain virtual until further notice


Compensation Range: $114K - $124K



This compensation range is indicative of the role. Compensation offered is on the basis of evaluation during interview process, the candidates range and depth of experience, business and market financials and internal pay parity.


**Want to know more?**



Check us out at https://www.designit.com/. Just so you know, we don't have a dress code, but we do have a strict no jerk policy.


*Designit is committed to ensuring that all candidates have an equal opportunity to be considered for employment. Please let us know if you need any reasonable accommodation to participate in the job application or interview process.*

title: Marketer
description:
* Analyze brand positioning and consumer insights
* Shape and communicate our vision and mission
* Translate brand elements into plans and go-to-market strategies
* Manage a team of marketing people working on brand initiatives
* Lead creative development to motivate the target audience to “take action”

title: Marketer
description:
**About the Role:**
-------------------


**Star Sports is the leading sports broadcaster in India. It offers a wide variety of sports content, broadcasting all major sports events such as IPL, ICC, Premier League, Pro Kabaddi, Wimbledon etc. Star Sports has redefined sports broadcasting in India with extensive cricket coverage, including domestic and international matches. It also offers several regional channels in different languages to cater to the diverse linguistic audience in India. We serve high quality content to millions of customers with world class technology and production. We are now seeking an individual to join our dynamic marketing team. This position is responsible for handling strategy & marketing plans for sports & grassroots initiatives like Khelo India Youth Games.**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Context:**
------------


**Star Sports is a key catalyst in espousing a multisport culture in India. Over the past 5 years, it has invested in and partnered with key stakeholders to popularize sports beyond Cricket. You will play a crucial role in supporting the smooth functioning of our organization. Your focus will be to grow viewership of the event on TV and to deepen engagement with light, medium and heavy consumers of the sport/event. The role will also oversee marketing efforts to recruit new viewers into the fold of the sport/event.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Key Responsibilities:**
-------------------------

* **Data Analysis: Assimilating and analyzing viewership trends, triggers and barriers for viewership for each property/event & ratifying different hypothesis basis the data analysis with the help of primary or secondary research where applicable.**
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Insight Development: Developing actionable insights into effective product, media, and communication plans.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Goal Setting: Developing and aligning the key goals for the marketing task ranging from awareness targets, intention to watch targets, media reach targets and viewership targets (TVR/event reach/frequency/consumption)**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Planning & Project Management: Planning and executing marketing plans for the key properties. Working with diverse and multi-functional project teams to manage end to end delivery of marketing plans for the different properties.**
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Marketing Communications: Developing clear briefs for the various properties/events as per the aligned goals/deliverables. Briefing the internal and external creative teams and clearly articulating the insights, potential campaign spaces and delivery expectations. Aligning the approach and finalization of the marketing communication plan (which should cover own media, paid media, digital, social, activations & programming) for the event. Driving the execution of individual plans along with a clear cascade plan which captures the on-air dates for all the different tactical elements of the marketing plan.**
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Campaign Execution: Working closely with Internal and External partners: Advertising agencies, media planners and media partners (Radio/Print/TV channels), research agencies, activation agencies, social and digital agencies, production houses/partners, Bollywood, and music studios. Developing 360 degree digital and communication plans through collaboration with key stakeholders: programming/content, ad-sales, distribution and internal corporate communications team. Assisting in planning and managing yearly multi-crore budgets in paid media and Star owned media for large impact properties.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Project tracking and review: Tracking the deliverables against the aligned goals/targets and crystallizing action points to be corrected in the next event.**
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Performance Measures:**
-------------------------

* **Viewership targets.**
-----------------------
* **Ideation and innovation.**
----------------------------
* **Cross functional collaboration**
----------------------------------

**Qualifications:**
-------------------

* **Qualification: MBA (Top-tier B-School)**
------------------------------------------
* **4 - 6 years of core marketing/brand experience and experience in driving ATL/BTL plans for large national consumer brands.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

**Personal Attributes:**
------------------------

* **Understanding of marketing principles, media planning, consumer research, ATL/BTL campaign development.**
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
* **Taking initiative and leading/managing teams.**
-------------------------------------------------
* **Clarity of thoughts in strategic initiatives.**
-------------------------------------------------
* **Sports Aficionado.**
----------------------

**About Star Sports :**
-----------------------

**The Star Sports Network is home to several leading domestic and international sports with 17 channels broadcasting premier sporting events which include cricket coverage under the purview of the TATA Indian Premier League (IPL), International Cricket Council (ICC), Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI), Cricket South Africa and Asian Cricket Council (ACC); VIVO Pro Kabaddi; Football under Hero Indian Super League (ISL), Premier League; and Wimbledon amongst others.**
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

title: Marketing Manager
description:
* Full-time

**Company Description**
-----------------------


Founded in the year 2007, Abhibus Services (India) Private Limited is a pioneer in providing end-to-end software and other value added solutions for bus transport Industry by leveraging the latest Technology of today. Abhibus aims to be the most preferred Information Technology partner for the State Transport Corporations and private Bus Fleet Operators.  

Abhibus is the only company in India that specializes in providing Online Reservation System Solutions for the Indian Bus Transport Industry. Abhibus has been in the fore-front of providing end-to-end software solutions and services to the bus industry in our country.

**Job Description**
-------------------


This position will be responsible for planning, coordinating, and overseeing the implementation of Above the line & Below the line marketing activities and campaigns.These activities include direct marketing, promotions, on ground activities, sponsorships, and other innovative brand visibility events. Must have an understanding of unit economics of brand spends, should be able to analyze e-commerce MIS with spends and impact analysis.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop and implement ATL & BTL marketing strategy in alignment with overall marketing budget. Analyze target audience and market trends to tailor campaigns for maximum impact.
* Responsible for executing end to end campaigns & present impact reports plus trend shift analysis.
* Coordinate with internal teams, agencies, and vendors to ensure the timely execution of ATL & BTL campaigns.
* **Source, negotiate, onboard and manage relationships with vendors and agencies involved in BTL activities.**
* **Develop project timelines, set milestones, and monitor progress to ensure adherence to deadlines.**
* **Liaise with creative teams and other stakeholders to ensure cohesive campaign execution.**
* Work closely with the finance department to manage budgets & book keeping for brand spends.
* Optimize spending to achieve maximum ROI and cost-effectiveness.
* Ensure collaboration and internal alignment with all team members.
* Establish key performance indicators (KPIs) for campaigns and evaluate results against objectives.
* Analyze data and feedback to make recommendations for continuous improvement for Vendor and Agency Management.
* Ensure all BTL campaigns comply with relevant regulations and guidelines.
* Provide regular reports and updates to management on the status and performance of BTL initiatives.
**Qualifications**
------------------

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
* 5-8 Years of experienced in BTL marketing, campaign management, or event planning
* Strong project management skills with the ability to handle multiple tasks simultaneously
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Analytical mindset with the ability to interpret data and make informed decisions
* Budget management experience
* Familiarity with travel industry trends
**Additional Information**
--------------------------


AbhiBus, being a 1500 crore revenue generating e-commerce player and a critical part of the ixigo group is looking to expand its brand across India and is hiring for experienced brand aficionados. Apply only if you have planned and executed a large scale brand strategy across states in India.

title: Brand Manager
description:
**About this Opportunity**

 **Key Responsibilities:**  

In this role, you would be responsible for all the brand marketing activities for redBus india Bus business  

We are looking for someone who is extremely passionate about consumer insights, championing the consumer and brand strategy with the ability to craft integrated marketing plans for Digital, ATL & BTL working in tandem with external agency partners and internal stakeholders. We are looking for someone with a consumer-first mind-set with a keen interest to attribute marketing efforts with business impact, and hence be comfortable with the creative, media and business dimensions of marketing. Another important attribute would be to have an ability to think about brand beyond communication and be a part of the entire journey to develop a holistic brand experience across consumer touch points.  

You would be responsible for **Brand Development:*** Developing and implementing innovative & creative marketing strategies aligned with the overall brand & marketing strategy of redBus India.
* Planning, executing, and tracking the performance of marketing campaigns across digital, ATL, and BTL media.
* Media Strategy and Execution: Translating brand objectives into media strategy and go-to-market media plans. Executing and optimizing media plans with the media agency (digital-first thinking).
* Conducting research on market trends, audiences, competitors, and end-to-end consumer journeys to drive engagements and conversions.
* Working closely with external agencies, influencers, and content creators for effective campaign execution and to drive brand visibility and engagement across platforms.
* Optimizing and analyzing campaign execution spends in accordance with expected revenue and impact on media, brand, and business metrics.

 **Execution and Tracking:*** Execution Excellence: Collaborating closely with the agency, revenue, and brand lead to closely track, manage, and report campaign performance.
* Measuring and reporting performance with comprehensive pre, mid, and post-campaign analysis and assessing ROI with predefined KPIs.
* Ensuring quick turnaround on critical deliverables.
* Demonstrating excellent negotiation skills with vendors to ensure quality, timely delivery, and cost-control.
* Tracking all vendor invoices and payments (pending and delivered).
* Working with the in-house creative team to efficiently deliver artwork for collateral and campaign communication elements.
* Driving the marketing planning & calendar, and activations across ATL, BTL, PR, and Digital.
* Collaborating effectively with cross-functional stakeholders (Product, Supply, etc.) to ensure full support from relevant teams in executing strategy.

 **Educational Qualification:** MBA in marketing or equivalent degree **Years of Experience :** Having 0-3 years of relevant work experience in managing and handling marketing campaigns end to end (from conception, budgeting to execution and tracking performance). Preferably in a new age startup/ consumer tech/ other B2C businesses. **Nature and scope of responsibilities the candidate should have handled**  

 0 to 3 years of prior experience of working as an assistant manager or senior brand executive in core brand management profile, preferably in start-ups /FMCG/ Consumer Tech and other B2C businesses* End to end campaign management – concept, budgeting execution, tracking and reporting
* Strong Communication Skills

* Proficient in Excel / Google Spreadsheets and PowerPoint

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Seeking Marketing Manager to drive strategic initiatives, manage campaigns, and enhance brand visibility. Responsibilities include developing marketing plans, overseeing advertising efforts, and analyzing market trends. The ideal candidate possesses strong leadership skills, creative thinking, and proficiency in digital marketing tools. With a proven track record in marketing strategy execution, they will propel our brand to new heights.


###### **Responsibilities:**


* Work collaboratively to strategically plan, develop and execute marketing campaigns to market diverse products and services while reinforcing our brand attributes and differentiators.


* Research, develop, execute, manage, and measure the effectiveness of integrated marketing campaigns and communications to support business strategies for both internal and external audiences (including customers, industry partners, vendors, community stakeholders, industry associations, etc.).


* Responsible for overall development and maintenance of website including page updates, new page development, blogs, case studies and other resources.


* Work closely with SEO partners to ensure success of website and online advertising opportunities.


* Proficient in social media engagement via Facebook, LinkedIn and Twitter.


* Create compelling, informative and audience-centric marketing and communications materials including: briefs, corporate profiles, key messages, executive speaking notes, customer presentations, brochures, videos, photo library, advertising copy, and digital and print content.


* Oversee hiring and managing of contractors (designers, writers, editors and other creative staff) to assist in the creation of internal and external communications tools.


* Identify and coordinate participation in industry trade shows and events.


* Monitor market trends and research consumer markets and competitors' activities to aid in the development of marketing campaigns and inspire the development of high-quality creative assets.


* Ensure all products, services and communication materials conform to brand identity.


* Oversee the application process of vendor joint marketing programs.


* Manage internal communication programming and messaging.


* Analyze marketing performance, optimize ROI for all advertising channels and events.

  


###### **Basic Qualifications:**


* Bachelors Degree/ Master ‘ degree in marketing
* 3-5 years of progressive, related experience in marketing and communications strategy and execution, ideally in a corporate setting.
* Exceptional project management skills, collaborative team player able to support multiple business priorities and tight deadlines.
* Experience in working on programs driven by large technology partners like Microsoft, SAP, HP, HCL or other technology companies.
* Strong customer-centric focus, with a proven ability to build and maintain effective relationships at all levels of an organization.
* Experience with social media and metrics data analysis for optimization.
* Grasp of brand development and ability to develop, write and implement strategic, integrated communications and marketing plans to promote brand.
* Strong overall business acumen and strategic mindset including understanding of budgeting, planning, advertising and promotions
* Exceptional writing and storytelling skills (written and verbal).
* Strong attention to detail.
* Team handling capacity
* Ability to drive the campaigns and projects.

title: Brand Manager
description:
**Designation**- Brand Marketing Manager  

  

**Experience** - 5 Years  

  

**Position Description** – Choosing where to start and grow your career has a major impact on your professional and personal life, so it's equally important you know that the company that you choose to work at, and its leaders, will support and guide you.
  

In the capacity of a Brand Marketing Manager, you will ensure the efficient execution of business plans to meet future brand expectations and targets. You will also take part in the development of short-term tactical Brand Management marketing plans. You will ensure brand integrity by guiding efforts across multiple channels and functions and support the development and execution of offline, digital, and paid social advertising programs for the business.  

The role entails the management of media campaigns from the beginning to the end and is also responsible for the execution across all media channels inclusive of TV, Radio, Digital, Print, and Paid Social. The Brand Marketing Manager reports directly to the Director- Womennovator.
  

  

**The Impact You'll Make in this Role** -  

  

**Strategy :**
 You will play part in the development of the brand marketing strategies in order to establish strategic direction and program positioning. In this capacity, the Brand Marketing Manager, you will develop marketing partnerships with media partners, and other external partners in an attempt to broaden the reach of the business’s brand messaging.  

You will also play part in the development and execution of paid social programs on advertising platforms inclusive of Facebook, YouTube, Pinterest, and Twitter etc. along with supporting the brand’s paid media programs. At this capacity, you will contribute to the development and execution of all online/offline events, promotions for the business/brand.  

  

**Management:** You will play a managerial role in the production process for all offline marketing materials, for example, project timelines, and so forth. You will be tasked with the maintenance of the lower department’s operational production budget, ensuring that there is a continuous effective and economical allocation of resources. You will also supervises multiple external agencies in developing creative advertising, high-impact promotions, and media planning,event sponsorship.
  

You will additionally manage media timelines and executes plans across all media channels, that is, TV, Social, Radio, and Print etc. you will effectively supervisethe junior marketing staff/team, managing workflow, providing direction, and overseeing constant skill development. You will strike a balance in ensuring all branding and key information strategies are in line with overall business strategy without compromising the brand’s integrity.  

  

**Collaboration:** You will work closely with Director, in reviewing and approving all branded elements for advertising and launch materials inclusive of printed collateral, product packaging, online assets, launch toolkits, product logos, and videos etc..
  

In this collaboration, he/she also provides feedback and insight on the performance of program campaigns and relays them for further strategic development and solution formulation. You will serves as a collaborative partner and liaison between all internal product departments in ensuring integrated campaigns and cohesive strategies. Youwill also be tasked with collaborating with external partners in ensuring that all media plans are aligned with the business’s values and goals, are executed on-time and on-budget.
  

  

**Analytics:** You will also play an analytical role where you will conduct research and analyses, translating campaign performance into communication documents and reports, which are distributed to management and key stakeholders. Some of these documents are marketing briefs, competitive analyses, campaign recap decks, and so forth.
  

At this capacity, You will track spending on all media campaigns for the purpose of ensuring that brand marketing efforts always stay within the allocated budget. Here, you will actualize cost reports per project at the completion of each brand marketing campaign. You will prepare account management, expenditure, progress, and other related reports. Additionally, you will review targeted spends and make real-time adjustments to optimize brand marketing campaign performance.
  

  

**Knowledge and Opportunity:** You will also conduct regular and consistent research and keep the business and the brand marketing department informed on best practices and the latest trends in brand marketing that ensure that the business does not lag behind of its competition and also in order to provide growth opportunity for the brand by capitalizing on the acquisition potential that alternative branding strategies/approaches may hold.
  

At this capacity, you will ensure that the product/service maintains a consistent tone that is relevant to the business’s brand and the audience, solidifying the brand identity by ensuring consistent, on-time and accurate development, deliveryfor each brand marketing campaign.
  

  

**Other Duties:** You will also performs other tasks as designated by the Director.
  

  

**To set you up for success in this role from day one, Womennovator is looking for candidates who must have the following qualifications:**  

  

* MBA or Master's Degree in Marketing (Completed and verified prior to
 start) from an accredited university
* Five (5) combined years’ experience in brand management or integrated marketing
* Three (3) years people leadership experience


* Strong communications (written, verbal, presentation and interpersonal) skills, including tact, diplomacy, and ability to influence and navigate across a diverse and complex organization.


* Highly proficient in Ms Word, PowerPoint, and Ms Excel

  

**Age:** Preferably below 35 years as on the closing date for receipt of application

title: Manager in Training
description:
**Work mode:** Hybrid
**Onsite Location(s):**Gurgaon, IN
**Additional Locations:** N/A
**Diversity - Innovation - Caring - Global Collaboration - Winning Spirit - High Performance**
At Boston Scientific, we’ll give you the opportunity to harness all that’s within you by working in teams of diverse and high-performing employees, tackling some of the most important health industry challenges. With access to the latest tools, information and training, we’ll help you in advancing your skills and career. Here, you’ll be supported in progressing – whatever your ambitions.
**About the position:**


Plans, develops, and coordinates in-house product training programs for field support personnel and customers. Obtains information needed to prepare in-house training programs; prepares training materials; develops course content; determines methodology; and coordinates the development of training aids. Conducts training sessions and develops criteria for evaluating effectiveness of training activities. May utilize trainers with technical expertise. Continuously revises lesson plans to meet new training requirements and to keep technical information up to date. Responsible for the successful execution of all training programs  


**Key Responsibilities:**


* Manage customer education programs through implementation of strategy, delivery of objectives and execution of logistics while effectively working with stakeholders.
* Ensure consistency in Boston Scientific branding guidelines.
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with key customers, internal and external, serving as a liaison between key educational opinion leaders and Boston Scientific programs.
* Communicate proactively to all levels of management and all stakeholders.
* Identify, partner with and manager appropriate resources (i.e., vendor relationships, other internal departments etc.) to ensure that meetings/events meet objectives.
* Define, track and maintain budgets while ensuring cost saving measures, understand implications on general business management.
* Evaluate program impact, reassess objectives and outcomes, and plan for continuous improvement.
* Keep abreast of industry standards and trends as related to responsibility and ensure compliance to governing agency guidelines.
* Create a professional development plan with the partnership of direct supervisor.
* Ensures awareness and compliance with applicable standard operating procedures to meet, comply and champion all quality and regulatory commitments of Boston Scientific.
* Work with direct supervisor and Marketing Director to maintain knowledge of the industry and the competition to modify and prioritize sales training strategies.
* Work closely with the Directors of Sales and the Directors of Marketing on various strategic projects.
* Work with Directors of Sales and Region Managers to coordinate Sales Training team field assignments.
* Provide feedback to VP of Sales received from field on training events and meeting support provided to the field.
* Responsible for providing continuous tools and education to team members to ensure up to date industry, competitive, and product knowledge.

  


**Requirements:**


* Graduate in B. Pharma or M. Pharma or BSc. Biotechnology or Cardiac Technology
* 5+ years relevant experience
* Prior experience from Medical Device industry preferred

  


**Requisition ID:** 574773  


As a leader in medical science for more than 40 years, we are committed to solving the challenges that matter most – united by a deep caring for human life. Our mission to advance science for life is about transforming lives through innovative medical solutions that improve patient lives, create value for our customers, and support our employees and the communities in which we operate. Now more than ever, we have a responsibility to apply those values to everything we do – as a global business and as a global corporate citizen.  


So, choosing a career with Boston Scientific (NYSE: BSX) isn’t just business, it’s personal. And if you’re a natural problem-solver with the imagination, determination, and spirit to make a meaningful difference to people worldwide, we encourage you to apply and look forward to connecting with you!  

  

**Job Segment:** Compliance, Marketing Manager, Medical Device, Branding, Law, Legal, Marketing, Healthcare

title: Marketer
description:
**Job Role: Marketing Database Lead** **About the Job,**
Your primary responsibility will be to manage, maintain, grow, and regularly update our contact database. You will use the collected data to conduct market and customer segmentation and run data analysis to optimize various campaigns and initiatives that are driven by the Marketing and Sales teams. The ideal candidate for this position is analytical, detail-oriented, and knowledgeable about digital marketing best practices. **Responsibilities*** Own, review, and audit the marketing database and ensure accuracy as well as a smooth transition of data from various platforms
* Consistently improve the quality of data through the removal of irrelevant data and appending new good quality data to existing contacts
* Identify and manage new data channels that ensure our demand generation and sales teams have the highest quality and fastest intelligence in the industry
* Establish and monitor KPIs to measure the quality of data, and efficiency of various campaigns, and create analyses and reports for the leadership
* Lead the marketing database function and manage a team of junior lead development specialists.
* Manage delegation of database requests, bring about automation in processes

 **Requirements*** 2-4 years of experience in Database Marketing or an associated field
* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Computer science, Database Management, or a similar field
* Extensive experience of database management activities such as mining, enriching, scraping, etc.
* Knowledge of database tools such as zoominfo, lusha, zerobounce, etc.
* Good to have proficiency with analytical tools and CRM tools (e.g., Hubspot)
* Analytical and problem-solving mindset, with strong attention to detail
* Exceptional organizational and prioritization skills and the ability to handle multiple projects simultaneously
* Good interpersonal and communication skills

 **About Us,**
Scrut Automation is an information security and compliance monitoring platform, aimed at helping small and medium cloud-native enterprises develop and maintain a robust security posture, and comply with various infosec standards such as SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, and the like with ease. With the help of the Scrut platform, customers reduce their manual effort for security and compliance tasks by 70%, and build real-time visibility of their security posture.  

Founded by IIT/ISB/McKinsey alumni, the founding team has over 15 years of combined Infosec experience. Scrut is built out of India for the world, with customers across India, APAC, North America, Europe and the Middle East. Scrut is backed by Lightspeed Ventures, MassMutual Ventures and Endiya Partners, along with prominent angels from the global SaaS community. **Why should this job excite you?*** Opportunity to make an early impact on one of the most promising,high-growth SaaS startups in India
* A flat-hierarchical, performance-driven culture

title: Marketing Manager
description:
Role: Marketing Manager  

Experience: 10–15 years in Marketing Domain.  

Education: Graduate - Marketing or MBA - Marketing Specialisation.  

Location: Pune.

**JOB SUMMARY:**  

  

SPAR Solutions seeks a dynamic, collaborative Marketing Manager to own, drive, and execute a comprehensive and integrated digital marketing and GTM strategy, product marketing, and campaigns in support of the business goals. He/She should be comfortable with day-to-day marketing activities, as well as long-term strategy, thriving with tight deadlines and changing needs. If you are a people person who loves the rewarding challenge of building a brand, we want to hear from you.

**POSITION REQUIREMENTS (Qualifications and Experience)**  

  

* Extensive demand generation experience in B2B tech, with expertise in leveraging digital channels to drive lead generation and brand amplification.
* Strong analytical skills, and demonstrable experience synthesizing data and making strategic decisions using Salesforce, Account Engagement (Pardot), etc.
* Empathy – for our team, our partners, our clients, and their customers.
* Team player with exceptional communication and interpersonal skills.
* Ability to operate and excel at strategic as well as tactical levels. Willingness to roll up sleeves to get the job done.
* Exceptional communication and collaboration skills, both at the executive level and with peers and cross-functional teams. Can clearly articulate ideas, frame problems and offer solutions.
* Ability to develop and optimize marketing strategies across key channels: SEO/SEM, paid social, email, owned web media properties, and third-party.
* Strong copywriting skills.
* Natural curiosity to discern product and solution messaging and position opportunities in the market to drive adoption and revenue targets.
* Oversee design and creatives.
* Strong and effective Storyteller.
* Knowledge of Pragmatic Product Marketing Framework.
* Thrive in complexity and ambiguity.
* Must be technically proficient and have a strong understanding of marketing processes.
* Ability to translate business needs into technical requirements.
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM tools.
* Analytical thinker, naturally curious, and thrives in working in cross-functional teams.
* Must be passionate about digital and interactive marketing strategies and integrated marketing.
* Must be motivated, a self-starter, a change agent and a perpetual learner.
**KEY DUTIES/RESPONSIBILITIES:**

* **Demand Generation:** Plan, implement, and measure multi-channel demand generation programs to drive brand awareness, inbound pipeline generation, and accelerated inbound revenue.
* **Leadership, Strategy, and Project Management:** Work directly with internal stakeholders, leadership and creative teams, leading the execution of our programs.
* **Data Analysis and Reporting:** Analyze performance data, report on the results, including campaign results, and data stories, and send recommendations. Rapidly iterate on a strategy based on findings.
* **Revenue Accountability:** Be accountable to revenue results, not leads.
* Bring products and solutions to the market through a pragmatic approach.
* Manage and oversee the marketing team, interns, and agencies.
* Have a strong design, writing, video creation and storytelling background.
* Coordinate and oversee all marketing projects and be very comfortable working in an agile environment that is fast-moving and technical.
* Help manage the current partnerships and enhance our web, social, and traditional marketing initiatives.
* Develop digital marketing strategies including the management and optimization of SEM, SEO, Social Marketing, LinkedIn, Content Creation (Video, Design, Podcast, etc.) and Email Marketing Automation using industry best practices.
* Collaborate with key stakeholders to develop, monitor, and optimize programs throughout the customer journey and sales funnel.
* Identify opportunities to develop new channels and/or expand existing channels for customer acquisition.
* Paid Media Campaign Management: Plan, test, implement, and measure multi-channel media campaigns to drive inbound demand.
* Perform audience research to develop new campaign ideas for paid search and paid social.
* Manage day-to-day performance across several media channels including LinkedIn.
* Rapidly iterate on a strategy based on findings.

**Note:**  

Should be open to adjusting to the US timings since collaboration with the US team is essential for this role.

**Physical Requirements:**

* **Should be willing to work from office.**
* **Should be able to join immediately.**
* Must be able to perform the essential functions of the position with or without reasonable accommodation.

**COMPANY PROFILE**:  

SPAR Solutions (based out of Atlanta, USA and Pune, India) is an employee-friendly place full of confident, result-oriented people with high energy levels and uncompromising work ethics. Compensation (matches or exceeds industry benchmarks) is driven by merit and performance; there is no limit to professional growth.


If you believe that values like a consultative, detail-oriented, quick learner, team player, high performance, creativity and fun are your calling, you would be a great fit on our team.  

  

**Contact Details:**  

Talent Acquisition Team  

HRM | HR Department/ SPAR Solutions  

Address: SPAR Solutions India Pvt. Ltd. Pune IT Park,  

B - 503, Bhau Patil Marg, 34 Aundh Road, Bopodi, Pune.  

Maharashtra, India. Pin Code: 411020.  

Website: sparsolutions.com  

LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/spar-solutions-llc  

Twitter: https://twitter.com/sparsolutions  

FB: https://www.facebook.com/SPARsolutions

title: Digital Marketer
description:

You will be in charge of developing and implementing our digital marketing strategy, as well as managing and overseeing our digital marketing campaigns across all platforms. You will work closely with the marketing team, the sales team, and external partners to achieve our marketing goals and grow our online presence.

title: Warehouse Lead
description:
Team Leader - Communications


**Category:** Finance
**Location:**Bangalore, Karnataka, IN  

**Department:** Communications, Finance GBS  

  

Live the future today! Set the strategies and participate in driving Novo Nordisk’s growth engines! Are you ready for new challenges at a highly complex and strategic level? If yes, then we have the perfect opportunity for you.  


**About the department**
Global Finance GBS Bangalore was established in 2007, is currently responsible for supporting Accounting, Finance & Procurement, Financial Planning & Analysis (FP&A) for Headquarters, region Europe, North America, International Operations (IO) & GBS Bangalore. The main purpose of our existence is to provide superior service to our stakeholders consistently and add value to the processes in terms of standardization and efficiency.  


**The position**Novo Nordisk is seeking an experienced and highly skilled team leader to manage a young and dynamic team of Content Writers and Graphic Designers, offering Communication as a Shared Service to global stakeholders. The Team Leader will be responsible for building a high-performing team that can cater to the complex stakeholder landscape. The ideal candidate should demonstrate self-dependence, strong business acumen, competence in making the right decisions, problem-solving capabilities, and leadership qualities, along with a strong technical knowledge and vast experience in internal / external communications.  

**Responsibilities:*** Independently manage and lead a team of early professionals to mid-level experienced team members including coaching / mentoring / training, supporting individual development plans, and driving continuous process improvements. Foster a culture of collaboration, innovation, and continuous improvement within the creative team.
* Oversee the planning, design, production, and distribution of internal communications materials, including but not limited to, newsletters, emailers, videos, and executive presentations. Ensure that all creative work is delivered on stipulated time, and to the highest quality standards.
* Complete ownership of projects delivered under the project working model, including project scoping, cost approvals, project management, creative supervision, driving day-day operations, and seamless execution of projects.
* Strong capabilities in resource planning, delegation, and effective prioritization of projects to ensure optimal and flexible use of resources, including timely identification and resolution of resource gaps.
* Lead the hiring process from sourcing, shortlisting, on-boarding & training new joiners, adapting to company culture to ensuring they are ready to support stakeholders independently with minimal guidance.
* Should possess strong leadership skills, with the ability to inspire and motivate the team, frequent pulse checks on their physical and emotional wellbeing, value diverse perspectives and display inclusive behavior and also should be open-minded, curious, and willing to experiment , have a strong quality mindset, and able to create a trusting environment.

  


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor’s/ master’s degree in communications /marketing / design or related field.
* 10-12 years of experience in communications, creative design, or related field with prior experience in managing a creative team.
* Proven experience in developing and implementing creative strategies, Adobe Creative Cloud.
* Excellent project management skills to handle multiple projects simultaneously.
* Subject matter expertise in communications/creative design with a strong portfolio of work.
* Excellent stakeholder management skills to build strong relationships with key stakeholders across the organization.
* Strong analytical skills to use data and analytics for decision-making.
* Strong business acumen and quick grasping power with excellent oral and written communication skills.
* Ability to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment with adaptability to changing priorities.
* Knowledge of pharma industry and experience with internal communications platforms and tools is a plus.

  


**Working at Novo Nordisk**
At Novo Nordisk, we create value by putting patients first. Every ten seconds two people are diagnosed with diabetes, and more than 425 million people worldwide need us. Working here is not just a way to make a living, but a way to make a difference.
At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.  


**Contact**
Please click on the link to apply  


**Deadline**
19th March 2024  



We commit to an inclusive recruitment process and equality of opportunity for all our job applicants.  


At Novo Nordisk we recognize that it is no longer good enough to aspire to be the best company in the world. We need to aspire to be the best company for the world and we know that this is only possible with talented employees with diverse perspectives, backgrounds and cultures. We are therefore committed to creating an inclusive culture that celebrates the diversity of our employees, the patients we serve and communities we operate in. Together, we’re life changing.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
Womennovator intends to engage Content writer cum Social Media Manager on the following terms and conditions:  

  

**Job responsibilities:** We need a content writer cum social media manager who will help in content creation, managing content on the website, and maintaining different social media platforms. The manager will develop and implement a Womennovator social media strategy, develop brand awareness, generate inbound traffic to social media platforms, and websites.
  

* Content Creation (Large and Technical) for the Womennovator’s website and social media platforms.
* Proofreading and editing.
* Content creation for Media (Print, Broadcast, and Digital)
* Managing social media platforms (Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Blogs, YouTube, LinkedIn), overseeing design (Facebook timeline cover pic, display ads, thumbnails, ads, profile pic, YouTube branding, Twitter profile, Instagram stories, and feed, and other theme-based events branding), overseeing day to day social media activity (addressing queries, concerns, flagging inappropriate comments and posts, writing and
scheduling daily posts, etc.).
* Help in the promotion (campaign planning and execution), create a unique voice for the brand on social media and Womennovator website and generate relevant content (on all social and online forums) to reach the audience most likely to engage with Womennovator.
* Develop a strategy to promote externally funded projects, executive education, in-house activities (seminars and workshops), and outbound events.
* Implement Search Engine Optimization (SEOs) for the website and Social Media.
* Using analytics (Google, Facebook, and other social media management tool) for effective social media presence and positive brand image of Womennovator.
* Maintain database for Womennovator & create and control the content calendar for several accounts across platforms, as well as the key influencer and stakeholders that touch them, both internally and externally.
* Liaise with internal teams such as clubs, committees, cells, programs, externally funded projects, theme-based events, etc., for content creation and management. Liaise with in-house designers and photographers, to produce creative assets and to share on different media channels.

  

**Womennovator Required qualifications:**  

* An M.A. degree in Mass Communication and Journalism or English or Media Studies or New Media Communication or Creative Writing or MBA in Marketing or Media Management.
* 3+ years of Social Media Marketing experience in corporate marketing, education the sector, social sector, or agency marketing role. Knowledge of Internet Marketing, Search Engine Optimization (SEO), and Web Development are desirable.
* Verifiable examples of social media marketing successes on different platforms - Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, Google+, YouTube, LinkedIn, Instagram.
* Expert level skills in using and navigating social media networks, native web apps, 3rd party social media tools.
* Candidate must possess good writing skills and the ability to visualize and convey a message with interesting and relevant content.

description:
Looking for an experienced, modern, and dynamic Mumbai-based Campaign Manager with excellent communication and proven experience in IT services campaign management. The ideal candidate should have a strong background in Zoho CRM, Zoho Campaigns, LinkedIn, LinkedIn Sales Navigator, and Zoom Info tool.

Easy Apply at https://bit.ly/3TpuwWb

What’s for the Candidate:

* Potential travel to Europe depending on projects
* Fixed Monthly + Incentive-based Compensation with a potential exponential increase based on performance
* Opportunity to work in a growing London-based MSP
* Opportunities for professional growth and development
* Dynamic and supportive work environment with a lean hierarchy and family-like work culture

Job Responsibilities:

company: BLUE CIRCLE MEDI SERVICES PVT LTD.
description:
**DIGITAL MARKETING EXECUTIVE JD**

**Lead Generation Specialist (Digital marketing)**

Min experience – 2 years

Job location – work from office

Duration – 6 days in week

Profile – Full time

Salary – Between 20,000 – 25,000 per month

Incentive – As per policy

**Job details:**

A Digital Marketing Executive plays a crucial role in planning, executing, and managing online marketing campaigns for a company or client. The specific job details may vary depending on the organization, industry, and the scale of their digital marketing efforts. Here is a general overview of the typical responsibilities and qualifications for a Digital Marketing Executive:

**Job Responsibilities:**

1. **Campaign Planning and Execution:**

· Develop and implement digital marketing strategies to achieve business goals.

· Plan and execute online marketing campaigns across various channels such as social media, email, search engine optimization (SEO), and pay-per-click (PPC) advertising.

2. **Content Marketing:**

· Create and optimize content for digital platforms, including websites, blogs, and social media.

· Develop and manage content calendars to ensure a consistent flow of content.

3. **Social Media Management:**

· Manage and grow the company's presence on social media platforms.

· Create and curate engaging content, and interact with the audience to build brand awareness.

· Tele-calling for lead generation

· Converting into f2f meeting

· Handle all social;

4. **SEO and SEM:**

· Optimize website content for search engines to improve organic visibility (SEO).

· Implement and manage paid advertising campaigns on platforms like Google Ads (SEM).

5. **Email Marketing:**

· Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads and retain customers.

· Monitor and analyze email campaign performance and make data-driven improvements.

6. **Analytics and Reporting:**

· Use analytics tools to track and measure the performance of digital marketing campaigns.

· Prepare regular reports, analyze data, and provide insights to improve campaign effectiveness.

7. **Budget Management:**

· Manage budgets for various digital marketing channels and campaigns.

· Optimize spending to maximize ROI and achieve marketing objectives.

8. **Market Research:**

· Stay updated on industry trends, competitor activities, and emerging technologies.

· Conduct market research to identify opportunities for growth and improvement.

**Qualifications and Skills:**

1. Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field.

2. Proven experience in digital marketing, with a focus on campaign management.

3. Familiarity with various digital marketing channels and tools.

4. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.

5. Excellent communication and interpersonal skills.

6. Creativity and the ability to think strategically.

7. Proficiency in using digital marketing tools such as Google Analytics, SEO tools, and social media management platforms.

8. Up-to-date knowledge of the latest trends and best practices in digital marketing.

Digital Marketing Executives often work closely with other departments, such as sales, design, and IT, to ensure a cohesive and effective digital marketing strategy. The role is dynamic and requires adaptability to the rapidly changing landscape of digital marketing

title: Marketing Program Manager
description:
We’re a diverse group of committed individuals empowered to thrive on challenge, share ideas, and pursue our ambition to transform the way commerce works.
  
  

So what about you? Do you want to help shape the future? Join us and you’ll open the gateway to a world of endless possibilities.
  
  

At Productsup you’ll be an intrinsic player in a vibrant culture that brings together people with opportunities, ideas with implementation, and ambition with achievement.
  
  

You can make great things happen in your career by making great things happen in commerce.
  
  

Productsup - the place where people are empowered to shape the future of commerce.
  
  

Your role and goals
  
  

We're looking for a Marketing Programs manager (m/f/d) to organize and oversee marketing programs and initiatives.
  
  

You will have a direct impact on our events and webinars, thus contributing to our MQL’s and growth goals. You will also collaborate with many stakeholders, so communication skills and willingness to collaborate are the key to success in this role!
  
  

**In your first 3 months you will:**  

* Get to know the organisation, team and your main stakeholders
* Understand the Productsup platform, our use cases, personas and competitor landscape as well as the structure and workflows of the Marketing organisation
* Start planning your first own program: develop campaign ideas, messaging and themes for specific target audience segments based on your knowledge of the market, our use cases, personas and their challenges


**In your first 6 months and beyond you will:**  

* Take full ownership of your programs from strategy to execution
* Leverage and contribute to our SAL and marketing pipeline goals
* Work together with our Content and Performance teams to get their support to deliver excellent programs
* Liaise with our Operations team as well as Pre-Sales and Sales to ensure a proper lead flow, a timely and individualized follow-up and also reporting for your marketing campaigns
* Leverage other channels like events and webinars owned by your colleagues in the Programs team


What you bring to the team
  
  

* Extensive experience in planning and executing marketing campaigns
* 5+ years’ experience in marketing for a B2B tech company (preferably SaaS)
* Strong project management skills
* Degree in marketing, corporate communications, or equivalent work experience
* Fluency in English (and German as a big plus) with excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM Systems (familiarity with Hubspot and Salesforce is a plus)
* Tech-savvy with a solid understanding of the online marketing and/or e-commerce industries
* Email-marketing (and nurturing) experience
* Ability to turn complex ideas into clear creative messages
* You are creative, love to take initiative, and cooperate with others


What we offer you
  
  

* A permanent position with an attractive salary at our growing company
* The option to work remotely and flexibly, because we know outstanding talent knows best how and where to work
* A unique and thorough onboarding program where you’ll learn the ins and outs of our company and product
* Ongoing internal and external training, plus a yearly learning budget to help you continuously grow professionally and further your career with Productsup
* Opportunities for engaging in our Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, plus one paid Impact Day per year dedicated to voluntary work
* Employee referral bonuses: we know that talent attracts talent, and we encourage you to refer people you know to join our team
* The opportunity to take ownership and responsibility, impacting the company’s growth in an international environment with 40+ nationalities


Productsup values diversity. We celebrate our differences and strive to learn from each other with the firm conviction that diversity drives innovation. Our commitment to equal opportunities begins at the hiring process and extends to our whole working culture. We pledge to social and environmental initiatives that support a sustainable environment. Everyone has a unique contribution to make and all are welcome.

title: Digital Marketer
description:
As a Digital Marketing Manager you are responsible for developing, implementing, and managing digital marketing strategies to enhance brand awareness, drive traffic, and generate leads or sales. They will oversee various digital channels such as websites, social media, email, search engines, and online advertising to achieve marketing goals and objectives.

**Responsibilities:**

* **Strategy Development:** Develop comprehensive digital marketing strategies aligned with company goals and objectives.
* **Campaign Management:** Plan, execute, and monitor digital marketing campaigns across various channels, ensuring campaigns are delivered on time and within budget.
* **Content Creation:** Collaborate with the content team to create engaging and relevant content for digital channels, including website copy, blog posts, social media posts, and email newsletters.
* **Social Media Management:** Manage social media accounts and create engaging content to build brand awareness, increase followers, and drive engagement.
* **SEO and SEM:** Optimize website content for search engines (SEO) and manage pay-per-click (PPC) advertising campaigns to improve search engine rankings and drive traffic.
* **Email Marketing:** Develop and execute email marketing campaigns to nurture leads, promote products or services, and drive conversions.
* **Analytics and Reporting:** Monitor and analyze key performance metrics across digital channels, using data to identify trends, measure campaign effectiveness, and optimize strategies for better results.
* **Budget Management:** Manage digital marketing budgets effectively, allocate resources strategically, and optimize spending to maximize ROI.
* **Team Leadership:** Lead and mentor a team of digital marketing professionals, providing guidance, feedback, and support to drive performance and achieve goals.
* **Stay Updated:** Stay abreast of the latest trends, best practices, and technologies in digital marketing, continuously seeking opportunities to innovate and improve strategies.

**Requirements:**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Business, or related field.
* Proven experience in digital marketing, with a track record of successful campaign management and achieving measurable results.
* Strong understanding of digital marketing channels, tools, and techniques, including SEO, SEM, social media, email marketing, and analytics.
* Excellent analytical skills and the ability to interpret data and insights to drive decision-making and strategy.
* Strong project management skills, with the ability to multitask and prioritize tasks in a fast-paced environment.
* Creative thinking and problem-solving abilities, with a keen eye for detail and a passion for innovation.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams.

* Analyze competitors and market conditions to formulate effective sales strategies to increase the gross profit margin.

2

Customer Relationship Management:

* Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, suppliers, and Industry stakeholders.
* Understand customer needs and provide customized solutions to enhance customer satisfaction.
* Ensure a high level of customer retention and loyalty.

3

Marketing and Branding:

* Develop and implement marketing strategies to promote the company's brand and products.
* Coordinate Marketing campaigns, trade shows, and promotional activities.
* Utilize digital marketing channels to enhance online presence.

4

Market Research and Analysis:

* Conduct Market research to identify new business opportunities and industry trends.
* Analyze customer feedback, market data, and competitor activities to make informed business decisions.

5

Sales Performance Analysis:

* Monitor and analyze Sales performance metrics to assess the effectiveness of sales strategies.
* Implement corrective actions and improvements as needed.
* Prepare regular reports for Senior management on sales and marketing activities.

6

Budget Management:

* Develop and manage the Sales and Marketing budget effectively.
* Ensure optimal allocation of resources to maximize ROI.

7

Team Leadership:

* Lead and motivate the sales and marketing team to achieve individual and team targets.
* Provide guidance, training, and support to enhance the team's skills and performance.
* Foster a collaborative and results-oriented team culture.
* **TEAM MANAGEMENT/LEADERSHIP**

**1**

* To attract, hire, lead and engage the Team and ensure effective management and achievement of business targets.

**2**

* Should be able to train, coach and guide the team in developing the right knowledge, skills and customer orientation.

**3**

* To assertively drive and ensure that the team is completely aligned on process discipline and meeting targeted milestones.

**4**

* Drive discipline in the team through regular review and feedback mechanisms and a complete grasp over data analytics / MIS for performance measurement.

**5**

* Have a zero-tolerance attitude towards lapses in integrity, compliances, internal governance standards and Company ethics.
* **QUALIFICATIONS AND EXPERIENCE REQUIREMENT**

**Qualifications**

Essential

* Master’s degree in Business, Marketing, or a related field. MBA is a plus.
* Proven experience in sales and marketing leadership roles within the steel trading industry.

**Skill**

* Respecting the internal value chain.
* Detail oriented, self-motivated and highly organized.

To conduct your actions with good judgment and in good faith.

title: Social Media Manager
description:
**About the Company:**

Hectar is a fast-growing Agri Tech startup that is transforming the way Agri commodities are supplied across borders. We are digitizing cross-border supply chains, making them more efficient, transparent, and sustainable. Our mission is to empower farmers and buyers by providing them with cutting-edge technology and data-driven insights that help them make better decisions and achieve better outcomes. We are passionate about using technology to make the Agri supply chain more resilient, secure, and profitable for all stakeholders.

**Job Description:**

We're looking for a highly creative and talented individual to join our team as a Creative Content Writer and Social Media Manager. In this role, you will be responsible for creating compelling visual and written content that showcases Hectar Global's mission to digitize cross-border supply chains of Agri commodities. You will work closely with the marketing and sales teams to develop and execute integrated marketing campaigns across digital and social media platforms.

Your main goal will be to bring the Hectar Global brand to life and make it exciting, inspiring, and aspirational for our target audience. You'll also be responsible for creating high-quality, engaging content that resonates with our customers and drives brand awareness and loyalty.

**Responsibilities:**

1. Develop and execute Hectar Global's brand strategy across multiple channels

2. Create and implement social media campaigns that engage and inspire our target audience

3. Develop and produce high-quality, engaging content for social media, website, email, and other channels

4. Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including product, sales, and marketing, to ensure brand consistency across all touchpoints

5. Monitor and analyze social media and website metrics to track performance and identify areas for improvement

6. Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices, and apply them to our brand strategy and content creation

**Requirements:**

§ Bachelor's degree in marketing, communications, or a related field

§ 1+ years of experience in brand strategy, content creation, and social media marketing

§ Strong creative vision and ability to bring ideas to life

title: Marketing Manager
description:
### **Overview:**


We are seeking a talented and strategic ABM Manager/Expert to lead our Account-Based Marketing initiatives. The ideal candidate will possess in-depth knowledge of ABM strategies and tools such as Demandbase, 6sense, HubSpot, and Sales Intelligence platforms, and a proven track record of successful ABM campaigns. This role requires a strategic mindset, strong analytical skills, and the ability to collaborate across departments to drive targeted engagement and revenue growth.

### **Key Responsibilities:**

* **ABM Strategy Development:** Design, develop, and execute comprehensive ABM strategies aligned with company goals and target accounts.
* **Technology Proficiency:** Utilize and optimize tools such as Demandbase, 6sense, HubSpot, and Sales Intelligence platforms to identify, target, and engage key accounts effectively.
* **Campaign Management:** Lead end-to-end ABM campaigns, from planning and execution to analysis and optimization, ensuring alignment with sales objectives and maximizing ROI.
* **Sales Alignment:** Collaborate closely with the sales team to align ABM efforts with their strategies, ensuring seamless coordination and mutual support in account targeting and engagement.
* **Data-Driven Insights:** Leverage data and analytics to drive decision-making, measure campaign performance, and provide actionable insights for continuous improvement.
* **Content and Messaging:** Work with the marketing team to develop personalized, high-impact content and messaging tailored to targeted accounts.
* **Cross-Functional Collaboration:** Engage with various teams including marketing, sales, product, and customer success to ensure a cohesive ABM approach across the organization.


‍

### **Qualifications and Skills:**

* Proven experience (3+ years) in Account-Based Marketing, preferably in a B2B technology or SaaS environment.
* Proficiency in Demandbase, 6sense, HubSpot, and other relevant ABM and marketing automation tools.
* Strong understanding of sales funnels, lead nurturing, and customer journey mapping.
* Analytical mindset with the ability to derive insights from data to drive marketing decisions.
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills for effective collaboration across teams.
* Strategic thinking with the ability to translate goals into actionable plans.
* Bachelor’s degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or related field (preferred).


‍

### **What can you look for?**


A wholesome opportunity in a fast-paced environment that will enable you to juggle between concepts, yet maintain the quality of content, interact, and share your ideas and have loads of learning while at work. Work with a team of highly talented young professionals and enjoy the benefits of being at Xoxoday.


‍

### **We are**


Xoxoday is a rapidly growing fintech SaaS firm that propels business growth while focusing on human motivation. Backed by Giift and Apis Partners Growth Fund II, Xoxoday offers a suite of three products - Plum, Empuls, and Compass. Xoxoday works with more than 2000 clients across 10+ countries and over 2.5 million users. Headquartered in Bengaluru, Xoxoday is a 300+ strong team with four global offices in San Francisco, Dublin, Singapore, New Delhi.


‍

### **Way forward**


We look forward to connecting with you. As you may take time to review this opportunity, we will wait for a reasonable time of around 3-5 days before we screen the collected applications and start lining up job discussions with the hiring manager. We however assure you that we will attempt to maintain a reasonable time window for successfully closing this requirement. The candidates will be kept informed and updated on the feedback and application status.

title: Marketing Program Manager
description:
We're a diverse group of committed individuals empowered to thrive on challenge, share ideas, and pursue our ambition to transform the way commerce works.



So what about you? Do you want to help shape the future? Join us and you'll open the gateway to a world of endless possibilities.



At Productsup you'll be an intrinsic player in a vibrant culture that brings together people with opportunities, ideas with implementation, and ambition with achievement.



You can make great things happen in your career by making great things happen in commerce.


**Productsup - the place where people are empowered to shape the future of commerce.**

### **Your role and goals**



We're looking for a Marketing Programs manager (m/f/d) to organize and oversee marketing programs and initiatives.



You will have a direct impact on our events and webinars, thus contributing to our MQL's and growth goals. You will also collaborate with many stakeholders, so communication skills and willingness to collaborate are the key to success in this role!

  

**In your first 3 months you will:**


* Get to know the organisation, team and your main stakeholders
* Understand the Productsup platform, our use cases, personas and competitor landscape as well as the structure and workflows of the Marketing organisation
* Start planning your first own program: develop campaign ideas, messaging and themes for specific target audience segments based on your knowledge of the market, our use cases, personas and their challenges


**In your first 6 months and beyond you will:**


* Take full ownership of your programs from strategy to execution
* Leverage and contribute to our SAL and marketing pipeline goals
* Work together with our Content and Performance teams to get their support to deliver excellent programs
* Liaise with our Operations team as well as Pre-Sales and Sales to ensure a proper lead flow, a timely and individualized follow-up and also reporting for your marketing campaigns
* Leverage other channels like events and webinars owned by your colleagues in the Programs team

### **What you bring to the team**


* Extensive experience in planning and executing marketing campaigns
* 5+ years' experience in marketing for a B2B tech company (preferably SaaS)
* Strong project management skills
* Degree in marketing, corporate communications, or equivalent work experience
* Fluency in English (and German as a big plus) with excellent verbal and written communication skills
* Experience with marketing automation and CRM Systems (familiarity with Hubspot and Salesforce is a plus)
* Tech-savvy with a solid understanding of the online marketing and/or e-commerce industries
* Email-marketing (and nurturing) experience
* Ability to turn complex ideas into clear creative messages
* You are creative, love to take initiative, and cooperate with others

### **What we offer you**


* A permanent position with an attractive salary at our growing company
* The option to work remotely and flexibly, because we know outstanding talent knows best how and where to work
* A unique and thorough onboarding program where you'll learn the ins and outs of our company and product
* Ongoing internal and external training, plus a yearly learning budget to help you continuously grow professionally and further your career with Productsup
* Opportunities for engaging in our Corporate Social Responsibility initiatives, plus one paid Impact Day per year dedicated to voluntary work
* Employee referral bonuses: we know that talent attracts talent, and we encourage you to refer people you know to join our team
* The opportunity to take ownership and responsibility, impacting the company's growth in an international environment with 40+ nationalities

 *Productsup values diversity. We celebrate our differences and strive to learn from each other with the firm conviction that diversity drives innovation. Our commitment to equal opportunities begins at the hiring process and extends to our whole working culture. We pledge to social and environmental initiatives that support a sustainable environment. Everyone has a unique contribution to make and all are welcome.*
