title: Business Development Manager
description:
Experience- 5 years - 6 years  
We are seeking a highly skilled and dynamic Marketing and Business Development Manager to join our team at Metadrob. As the Marketing and Business Development Manager, you will be responsible for overseeing our marketing efforts while also driving business growth by expanding our customer base and creating new revenue streams. This role requires a strategic thinker with a strong background in marketing, business development, team management, and a proven ability to generate new orders and establish new verticals.  
Responsibilities:

Marketing Strategy and Execution:

* Develop and implement comprehensive marketing strategies aligned with the company's goals and objectives.
* Oversee all marketing activities, including SEO, SMO, PPC, content marketing, and social media campaigns.
* Collaborate with the marketing team to create compelling content and promotional materials that drive engagement and generate leads.
* Monitor and analyze marketing performance metrics, optimize campaigns, and provide insights to enhance marketing effectiveness.

Business Development:

* Identify and target potential clients, build strategic partnerships, and generate new business opportunities.
* Conduct market research and competitor analysis to identify customer needs, market trends, and new verticals for expansion.
* Lead the sales process from prospecting to closing, negotiating contracts, and ensuring customer satisfaction.
* Develop and maintain strong relationships with key clients, industry influencers, and partners to drive business growth.

Team Management and Cost Control:

* Manage and mentor a team of marketing and business development professionals, providing guidance and support to achieve team objectives.
* Set clear performance goals, conduct regular performance evaluations, and foster a collaborative and high-performing team culture.
* Monitor and control the cost of the marketing and business development activities, ensuring efficient resource allocation and ROI optimization.

Financial Analysis and Forecasting:

* Conduct financial analysis, track marketing and business development expenses, and prepare regular reports for management review.
* Collaborate with the finance team to develop accurate revenue forecasts and budgets for the marketing and business development department.

Requirements:

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field (Master's degree preferred).
* Proven experience (X+ years) in marketing management, business development, and team leadership.
* Strong knowledge and experience in marketing strategies, SEO, SMO, PPC, and digital marketing channels.
* Demonstrated track record of successful business development, including lead generation, client acquisition, and revenue growth.
* Excellent negotiation, communication, and interpersonal skills, with the ability to build and maintain strong client relationships.
* Strategic mindset with the ability to identify new market opportunities and drive business expansion.
* Strong financial acumen, with the ability to analyze financial data, control costs, and forecast revenue.
* Leadership skills with a proven ability to manage and inspire a diverse team.

Join us on this exciting journey of transforming the retail industry through cutting-edge technology. If you are a dynamic and results-oriented professional with expertise in marketing, business development, team management, and a passion for driving growth, we would love to hear from you. Apply now and help us take Metadrob to new heights!  
Note: Please include your portfolio or relevant work samples along with your application

title: Marketing Manager
description:
**ROLES AND RESPONSIBILITIES**

# Lubricant Industry

⦁     Stay informed regarding prices, products, promotions, developments and strategies among others of the competition.

⦁     Conduct market research and analysis of competitors and customer. Analyze data to identify sales opportunities. Investigate lost sales and customer accounts. Track, compare and interpret sales figures.

⦁     Generate Marketing strategies to promote products, services and the image of the company.

⦁     Propose ideas for brochure, merchandising and all advertising material.

⦁     Development of strategic Marketing strategies, to build customer loyalty.

⦁     Prepare analysis and models on the evaluation of the market, habits and tastes of the target audience and trends of the categories or products of the company. Carry out segmentations that allow establishing strategies more oriented to business niches.

⦁     Conduct commercial research on existing or new products, studying the weaknesses, threats, strengths and opportunities in the market.

⦁     In coordination with Marketing, Sales Supervisor and sales force; develop the price study of the competition’s product on a monthly basis and recommends the pricing strategies for different products.

⦁     Analyzes the positioning of the different brands in the market and recommends according to the Marketing plan, the positioning for the different products of the company.

⦁     Study the packaging and labels of our products and the competition to suggest modern, creative and attractive packaging for the consumer.

⦁     Review the quality and functionality of the different products on the market, as well as identify trends to be updated in advertising and promotions.

⦁     With the Marketing team, helps to develop the advertising and promotion campaign for our company products, both in ATL and BTL.

⦁     Lead the development of the sales forecast by product, with must come from sales force of each business unit. Monitor and ensure with the different headquarters the different monthly adjustments of said sales estimates.

⦁     Ensure Marketing in the sales channel to improve product rotation, promoting and increasing sales through the planning and coordination of events and promotions.

⦁     Develop the merchandising plan and carry out actions to improve traffic in the PDV.

⦁     Create harmony and synergy between the brand strategy and the channel.

⦁     Create a positive environment for the brand to develop a benefit for the channel.

⦁     Profitability evaluation of promotional actions.

⦁     Suggests improvements in the packaging of the product compared to the market.

**Sportskeeda - For the hardcore sports fan**

title: Marketing Manager
description:
**Company Overview**

The Sagar Hospitals® is a prestigious healthcare services institution with two tertiary care multi-specialty hospitals, four clinics, and a chain of 12 pharmacies. We are a division of the esteemed 400 INR Crore Sagar Group, established in 1960. Our healthcare services have achieved a global brand status, bringing pride to Bangalore. We have received various accreditations and are known for our medical and technological successes.

**Job Overview**

We are looking for an experienced Senior International Marketing professional to join our team at Sagar Hospitals. As the International Marketing Manager, you will be responsible for developing and implementing marketing strategies to expand our brand presence globally. This is a full-time position based in Bangalore, India, and requires a minimum of 7 to 10 years of experience in international marketing.

**Qualifications and Skills**

* Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
* Proven experience in international marketing, preferably in the healthcare industry
* Strong understanding of global markets and cultural nuances
* Creativity and ability to think outside the box to develop innovative marketing strategies
* Proficiency in social media platforms and marketing tools
* Strong analytical thinking and problem-solving skills
* Excellent leadership and project management abilities
* Knowledge of advertising techniques and principles
* Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
* Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment

**Roles and Responsibilities**

* Develop and execute international marketing strategies to promote our brand and services
* Identify and analyze market trends and competitive landscape to identify opportunities and threats
* Drive international market research and competitor analysis to understand and adapt to market dynamics
* Plan and oversee marketing campaigns and initiatives targeted at international markets
* Manage and coordinate with external agencies, partners, and vendors to execute marketing activities
* Create compelling marketing collateral, including brochures, presentations, and website content
* Utilize social media platforms and digital marketing tools to enhance brand visibility and engagement
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure consistent messaging and branding across all channels
* Monitor and report on the effectiveness of marketing campaigns and initiatives
* Stay up-to-date with industry trends and best practices in international marketing

Job Type: Full-time

Benefits:

* Cell phone reimbursement
* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

Supplemental pay types:

* Performance bonus
* Yearly bonus

Work Location: In person

title: Senior Marketing Manager
company: Amazon Digital Services Private Limited - M86
description:

The candidate for this role will be responsible for outbound program management across email and push notifications, executing campaign strategies aimed at driving discovery, trials and engagement with the right content. The candidate should be an experienced marketer with deep customer marketing knowledge, and broad experience in CRM / Outbound Marketing, including acquisition, engagement, and/or product marketing. Candidates will have experience managing internal stakeholders across teams, as well as an aptitude for data analysis. Driving results through continuous improvement, and learning through exhaustive testing is highly valued. This role will be based out of Mumbai.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
This is an individual contributor role driven by a customer mindset coupled with sharp analytical skills, and a high sense of business ownership. Rigorous implementation and proven ability to influence without authority will be critical to succeed in this role.
  
  

** Deliver Business Impact:** Design an impactful outbound marketing plan leveraging key datapoints based on current reach and past campaigns to drive for highest potential engagement from email and push notifications campaigns
  
** Rigorous Optimization:** Deeply analytical, Create innovative experiments to drive for incremental streamers. A/B test creatives and copy to maximize CTRs. Prior experience with BIG tests
  
** Implement with Accuracy & Efficiency:** Deliver planned Outbound Marketing campaigns by managing the operations team’s processes to ensure highest level of efficiency and accuracy in creating email and push notification campaigns
  
** Performance Management:** Publish Outbound Marketing performance through weekly, monthly and quarterly business reviews with senior stakeholders
  
** Stakeholder Management:** Influence internal stakeholders on the prioritization of outbound campaigns to drive for maximum engagement and viewers, with minimal impact to opt-outs
  
** Fully leverage automation:** Support rollout of automated campaigns, working closely with Global Product teams. Track performance of these campaigns to ensure that they are delivering strong results for India
  
** Understand the Consumer:** Using a targeted approach, send the right content to the right customer segment to maximize campaign engagement
  
  

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
  
  

Mumbai, MH, IND
  
  

* Knowledge of SQL at the interemdiate level
* Knowledge of HTML at the intermediate level

title: Store Manager
description:
* 8+ years of professional non-internship marketing experience
* Experience using data and metrics to drive improvements
* Experience with Excel or Tableau (data manipulation, macros, charts and pivot tables)
* Experience communicating results to stakeholders
* Experience with A/B Testing or Multi-Variate Testing or both
* Experience building, executing and scaling cross-functional marketing programs
* Experience in driving optimization of conversions on storefront or homepage
* Experience with designing and running experiments and contributing to Global Product experiment roadmaps
* Ability to prioritize ruthlessly to achieve business KPIs, knowing when to deprioritize and say no to stakeholders
* Experience presenting metrics and progress to goal to c-suite stakeholders
* Experience building, executing and scaling cross-functional marketing programs
* Ability to transform thinking quickly from high-level, strategic thinking into auditing detailed execution
* Excellent communications skills to drive recommendations, articulate tradeoffs, and communicate plans to senior executives
* Writes with laser-sharp clarity, using data to support assertions while still inspiring new thoughts and solutions
* Demonstrated success in driving efficiency in existing processes to enable scaling up of tasks with less effort required
* Ability to juggle a range of projects across Amazon teams balancing quality and speed


An exciting opportunity which requires a talented marketeer with an innate ability to turn data into actionable insights, and implement actions to drive strong engagement outcomes.
  
  

This role requires strong business and customer first acumen and offers exposure to multiple senior stakeholders within Amazon Prime Video. As this function has direct impact to business outcomes, it is a perfect fit for an ambitious, strategic, self-starter with a keen understanding on the customer funnel and how to drive streaming conversion.
  
  

The candidate should be an experienced marketer with deep customer marketing knowledge, and experience driving conversion. Candidates will have experience working cross-functionally across internal teams, as well as an aptitude for data analysis. A mind for innovation, thinking big, and learning through testing is highly valued. This role will be based out of Mumbai.
  
  

Key job responsibilities
  
This is an individual contributor role with a path to people management. Sharp analytical skills, high ownership and customer obsession, and proven ability to prioritize ruthlessly to achieve results will be critical to succeed in this role.
  
** Drive Customer Engagement:** Full ownership of customer engagement metrics, understanding, analyzing and reporting them on a regular cadence (weekly, monthly, annually) to the India PV Organization, taking actions to increase engagement, and influencing others where required
  
** Plan for Success:** Design a customer driven storefront roadmap aimed at increasing customer engagement and conversions as soon as they visit Prime Video Hub leveraging personalization, Global tools and manual overrides
  
** Optimize for Conversions:** Execute the vision proposed by systematically running a well-defined program with clarity on projects, ownership, and delivery timelines. Optimize conversions by finetuning and tweaking storefront placements through experiments. Utilize data to build an operating plan that maximizes conversions daily.
  
** Influence Product:** Interface with Global Storefront Product teams and hold them accountable to driving performance in India. Contribute to and manage experiments from an India perspective and ensure that all rollouts drive incremental conversion without harming engagement.
  
** Stakeholder Management:** Collaborate across multiple teams to provide visibility for entertainment content that resonates well with the right customers, but also know where to provide less support where it damages engagement. An ability to lead with confidence and conviction in prioritizing levers is integral
  
** Increase visibility:** Raise the profile of Storefront Marketing within the Prime Video Organization by presenting regular Quarterly Performance Reviews and Annual Roadmaps outlining initiatives run locally as well as by Global Product teams
  
** Drive Streamer to Shopper:** Identify opportunities to drive shopper behavior while streaming on Prime Video to encourage cross-business behavior and deepen customer engagement with Amazon
  
** Drive entertainment hub:** Strengthen the offering to the customer by leveraging our business lines to drive engagement, across miniTV, Prime Video content and add-ons
  
  

About the team
  
The O&O Team is a close-knit collaborative team with strong aptitude for data and ability to manage complex tasks. This team also takes full ownership of customer engagement which requires a solid grasp of key engagement metrics and a track record of high performance.
  
  

We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
  
  

Mumbai, MH, IND
  
  

* Experience using any of SQL or other analytical tools for conducting data analysis
* Master's degree in management, business administration, economics, engineering, marketing

title: Brand Manager
description:
* 1+ years of account management, project or program management or buying experience
* Bachelor's degree
* Experience using analytical specific tools such as Google Analytics, SQL or HTML


Amazon.com strives to be Earth's most customer-centric company where people can find and discover virtually anything they want to buy online. The Brand Specialist will work on offering dedicated support to top-tiered brands to grow with Amazon by identifying and improving key customer inputs for growth such as content, marketing and stock availability among others. Apart from this, the Brand Specialists will also help brands leverage Amazon’s tools and programs to improve on their business inputs.
  
We are seeking creative, goal-oriented and highly entrepreneurial people to join our exciting and fast-paced team.
  
  

**About the Role:**  

As a Brand Specialist, you will focus on delivering 5 core focus areas for the brand: Selection, demand generation, catalogue quality, business advice and availability.
  
  

The person who joins the leadership team in this position must share our passion and commitment for serving our customers. This ideal candidate should have experience in forging and building brand relationships. Some understanding of planning product cycles and selling online is preferred. The right candidate will be flexible, action and results oriented, self-starting and have strong analytical skills. He or she must have a proven track record in taking ownership, driving results and moving with speed to implement ideas in a fast-paced environment. He should be entrepreneurial with the confidence to make independent, data-driven decisions. The candidate must demonstrate the ability to succeed at: planning and forecasting, and driving an online business. The candidate must be an effective communicator in working with some of Amazon’s most important partners and vendors, as well as with internal colleagues and groups.
  
  

Responsibilities
  
  

**This person will have responsibility for:**  

-
  
**Building selection:** Identify selection gaps. Track brand’s offline catalogue to ensure all relevant selection is present on Amazon.
  
  

-
  
**Demand generation:** Responsible for demand generation. This includes working with other members on the category management team to create a marketing calendar based on vendor's objectives
  
  

-
  
**Business Advice:** Support participation of brand in Amazon programs
  
  

-
  
**Availability:** Ensuring continuous availability of products
  
  

* Catalogue Quality on Amazon: Ensuring the best input from brand is updated for customer interface on Amazon Detail Pages through perfect Images, Product descriptions, etc.


We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
  
  

Bengaluru, KA, IND
  
  

* Experience in process improvement
* Experience managing large amounts of data

title: Sales and Marketing Manager
description:
Assistant Manager- Sales & Marketing will be primarily responsible for executing the sales strategy of the resort with the ultimate objective of maximizing revenues by optimum usage of online and offline platforms

Key Duties & Responsibilities

* Devise and implement the overall sales and marketing plan for the resort and actively monitor its progress in terms of achieving KPI’s, budgets and revenues.
* To be responsible to develop and foster business through pro-active online and offline platforms.
* Liaise with the General Manager in adopting sales strategies for the resort
* Build-on and develop relationships with major agencies for promoting the resort
* Analyse current markets and identify new markets and potential clients.
* To optimise and achieve sales and revenue generation through digital marketing initiatives and social media campaigns
* Effective usage of all tools including telemarketing, direct mail, appointment calls etc.
* Manage the number and performance of third party and promotional websites and liaise with providers in ensuring optimisation of the resort’s online position.
* Proactively monitor the Resort’s profile on the various social media platforms and ensure appropriate responses are posted in a timely fashion.
* Liaise with outsourced Digital Team in managing the content of the Resort’s website.
* Manage all promotional collateral from copyright through to design and print and ensure that it is in line with our branding
* Ensure in house promotional material is current, effective and supports any new sales and marketing promotions.
* Manage the guest database and ensure that client’s details are accurate and UpToDate.
* Ensure that all client correspondence is tracked and recorded, including quotations and contracts.
* Represent the resort at consumer trade fairs, mall promotions and tourism events both at local and national level.
* Maintain the highest standards of professional conduct at all times when dealing with clients, guests etc.
* Conduct weekly snapshot meetings with GM update on activities/sales to date and plans for the weeks ahead.
* To prepare and submit weekly Sales & Marketing activity reports to the GM.
* Monitor the progress of sales team through weekly/ monthly activity reports
* Encourage positive working relations with all departments by regular communications and feedback.

Job Types: Full-time, Permanent

Salary: ₹25,000.00 - ₹35,000.00 per month

Benefits:

* Health insurance
* Provident Fund

Schedule:

* Day shift

Supplemental pay types:

* Performance bonus

Ability to commute/relocate:

* Ernakulam, Kerala: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)

Education:

* Bachelor's (Preferred)

Experience:

* total work: 3 years (Preferred)
* Hotel Sales: 2 years (Preferred)
